athamwita galla maha welendapolata gihin minisunta athyawashya aahara drawya wana piti, sini, sahal, karawala, kiripiti, parippu wani aahara drawya gena eemata pawa mata siduwuwa. 1975 wasaredi me siyalla dayakayanta pawara di iwathwuwa.1950 wasaredi ekthara kalayaka ape rate wamanshika deshapalana paksha nayakayan athadanguwata pathwuna.
ow yalu..aadare karanna oone.eeth baldu karaganna narakayi.aadareta watinakamk thiyenna oone.
balanna gaththa eke okkoma pinthura tika balalama thamayi mama ee profayil eka klos kale..
ithin mama tikak hoyala balala saha athdakimen, lipiyak liyanna hithuwa wardpres adawiyak ewan karadara walin bera ganimata karanna puluwan sarala dewal tikak gana kiyanna.

rusiyawe mariya kirilenko 6 – 4 k saha 6 – 4 k lesa parajayata pathkala ithaliye franseska chiyawone samanga eelanga tharagayata aya muhuna dimata niyamithaya.me athara jagath tenis shrenigatha kirimwala 2 wani sthanaye pasuwana amerikawe winas wiliyams pransha wiwrutha tenis tharagawaliye iwath kirimata rusiyawe nadiya pethrowa samathwuwaya.6 – 4 k saha 6 – 3 k lesa winas siwuwani watayedi parajayata pathkala pethrowa eelanga tharagayedi siya ratenma prathiwadi kridika elina dimentiwa samanga tharaga wadimata niyamithaya.me athara beljiyame jastin henin 2 – 6 k, 6 – 1 k saha 6 – 4 k lesa parajayata path karamin ardha awasan purwa watayata sudusukam laba ganimata oostreliyawe samantha stosar samath wuwaya.jagath tenis pitiye anka eke kridaka amerikawe serina wiliyams, eeshrayalaye shahar pirta erehiwa 6 – 2 k saha 6 – 2 k lesa pahasu jayak wartha karamin ardha awasan purwa watayata piwisiyaya.

meka awasthawak karagaththu itha balawath arabi welenda (nama mathaka na...)rahasa eli nokirimatanam min pasu ema warada nokarana lesath,arabi karayen pamini thaman muslim aagame balayen yakshaya winasha kara bawath,ema nisa muslim aagama itha balawath bawath,sama denama methan patan budu dahama athahara islam dahama walanda gatha yuthu bawath danwiya.raja eda patan mala diwayina islam rajyayak lesata prakashayata path karalu.adatath wenath kisidu aagamak ho aagamakata sambanda lipiyak ho maladiwayine pala nowe.kotinma kiyanawanam wesak kad ekak,naththal kad ekak wath maladiwayinata thapalen enne na.owun eewa winasha karanawa.ese muslim warun winasha kara damu wehera wiharasthana wala natambaun adatath dakunu desa athi samahara jana shunya dupath wala thibenawalu.me kathawe sathya asathya nam mama hariyatama danne na.eeth pera bauddha ratak wa thibi pasuwa balahath karayen islam dahama waladagath bawa nam wishwasa karanna puluwan.
